about.me: Manager at Accenture with over 10 years experience in financial services with a particular focus on programming tax engines. Computing with Industry graduate from the University of Leeds (UK) – Final year project on distributed systems. Currently studying for a Graduate Diploma of Applied Tax Law. Current location – Sydney, Australia
about.server: Combination of bare metal and Cloud based servers. 1 Block producer (with automated failover) along with 4 Relay Nodes (3 public, 1 hidden). Main nodes run on AMD Ryzen 7 5700U 8 Core 16 Thread CPU, 64GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM, 1TB NVMe SSD
about.company: Secure, Reliable Trusted. LEAD believes that stake pool operators should help and communicate with current and potential delegators as much as possible. LEAD are committed to making this a long term project meaning you do not need to constantly check up on your delegation. LEAD believes in decentralisation and is committed to running a single pool along with also being part of the Cardano Bare Metal Alliance. LEADs rewards will currently remain within the pool to increase pledge amount meaning a higher total stake overall. LEAD also runs on Cardano Testnet and helps test the latest releases whilst also testing all operations before deploying to our Mainnet nodes
